eu.stratosphere.nephele.services.iomanager

Class ChannelAccess<T,R extends eu.stratosphere.nephele.services.iomanager.IORequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.services.iomanager.ChannelAccess<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The buffer type used for the underlying IO operations.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockChannelAccess

    public abstract class ChannelAccess<T,R extends eu.stratosphere.nephele.services.iomanager.IORequest>
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for readers and writers that read data from I/O manager channels, or write data to them. Requests handled by channels that inherit from this class are executed asynchronously, which allows write-behind for writers and pre-fetching for readers.
    Author:
    Alexander Alexandrov, Stephan Ewen

    • Method Detail

      • isClosed

        public abstract boolean isClosed()
        Checks, whether this channel has been closed;
        Returns:
        True, if the channel has been closed, false otherwise.

      • getChannelID

        public final Channel.ID getChannelID()
        Gets the channel ID of this channel.
        Returns:
        This channel's ID.

      • checkErroneous

        public final void checkErroneous()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the exception state of this channel. The channel is erroneous, if one of its requests could not be processed correctly.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the channel is erroneous. The thrown exception contains the original exception that defined the erroneous state as its cause.

      • deleteChannel

        public void deleteChannel()
        Deletes this channel by physically removing the file beneath it. This method may only be called on a closed channel.
